item.title: Sharing life piece
item.description: Always Somewhere The Scorpions are a German hard rock band formed in Hanover in 1965 by guitarist Rudolf Schenker. The fan favourites as “Loving You Sunday Morning”, “Always Somewhere”, “Holiday” and the instrumental “Coast to Coast”, it firmly cemented the “Scorpions formula” of hard rock songs mixed with melodic ballads Always Somewhere
